title: Urgot Professional Fanart

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: The time of urgots rework is coming closer and closer. So I, a professional artist and autistic urgot main, thought about drawing this cute little fella.

replies.body: I like the squishy crab rolls on his big ol battle crab tummy.
Perfect to cuddle him and use him as pillow.

"The Church of Urgod"

wat

Jhin would be proud bro 
4/4.
"Perfection"
As an audio team member, this joke pleases me.
Context on using the term Autistic in your post?
*REEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE*

That's the autistic screeching meme, you can see it in its natural habitat spammed in twitch chat (mostly saw it in imaqtiepie chat with the appropriate pepe emote), and it has its origin (beside the actual autism) from this video 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g_VtIkF8pDY at 3:12.
Making light of Autism is wrong. It's a serious condition that real people struggle with.

Nobody denies that, but literally every medical term is used improperly on the internet as either the butt of a joke or as a derogatory term.
If you are new to the internet, then you are in for a huge shock.
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CFAxLCTVEAAUw6G.jpg
P.S. Yes I know the meme has terrible grammar, I didn't make it. Don't hurt me.

"Everybody else does it so why shouldn't I?"

Bandwagon is a fallacy. If everyone else was jumping off a cliff would you do it too? No?

Didn't think so.

Doing wrong doesn't magically become right just because it is popular to do.

I never said I encourage the action, I only said that it is very common.

Don't get all keyboard warrior, use your time to breathe heavily somewhere else.

> [{quoted}](name=Titanium Legs,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=nb3nbrcy,comment-id=00040000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-06-11T23:02:50.675+0000)
>
> I never said I encourage the action, I only said that it is very common.

Why defend the action then?

> Don't get all keyboard warrior, use your time to breathe heavily somewhere else.

Throwing labels on me won't deter me. You're making shit up.

All I'm saying is stop expecting people to stop using their vocabulary the way they do. They aren't going to listen to some random person on the internet telling them to stop.

The very fact that you even kept this conversation going just proves my "label". I think you are the only person to go out of their way to point out that they misused a word in a memes and games post. I could understand if they were outright insulting the group mentioned, but all they did was refer to themselves as one.

The conversation is over, I don't condone what others say, but it doesn't mean that they don't have the right to say it.

> [{quoted}](name=Titanium Legs,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=nb3nbrcy,comment-id=0004000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-06-13T03:12:32.126+0000)
>
> All I'm saying is stop expecting people to stop using their vocabulary the way they do. They aren't going to listen to some random person on the internet telling them to stop.
> 
> The very fact that you even kept this conversation going just proves my "label". I think you are the only person to go out of their way to point out that they misused a word in a memes and games post. I could understand if they were outright insulting the group mentioned, but all they did was refer to themselves as one.

It's not about me, it's about saying things like "that's gay" and "that's retarded" It's hurtful to people who identify or are categorized under those labels.

> I don't condone what others say, but it doesn't mean that they don't have the right to say it.

That's a fair point, but people's words still have impacts on others. It's important to consider that. Telling a joke about concentration camps will elicit a negative response from people, shrugging it off saying, "it was just a joke..." does not change that it was inappropriate.

You don't walk around on the street telling racist jokes because it's considered inappropriate. Same thing should be the case with misusing words like "Gay" "Retarded" and "Autistic"
If you do another, draw Giant Enemy Crabgot next :O
I will remember that. :V
I'm only a lowly mastery level 6 Urgot, but Crabgot and Butcher are my favorites. Mostly because of how grotesque they are
hot af
Urgotta be kidding me?!
